landing.title: Level up your life like a game
landing.description: AltLoc is a gamified personal growth platform for Gen Z. Build your Identity Matrix, explore Domains, complete Quests, earn XP & crystals ‚Äî level up your life like a hero.
landing.stepsTitle: Level Up Your Life with AltLoc
landing.stepsDescription: AltLoc transforms self-improvement into an RPG adventure. Build your Identity Matrix, explore Domains, create Habits, and earn crystals & XP while growing your personal hero.

step1.title: Step 1: Build Your Identity Matrix
step1.description: Define who you want to become. Select or create your unique Identity Matrix to guide your quests.

step2.title: Step 2: Explore Domains
step2.description: Choose life Domains like Health, Knowledge, Finances ‚Äî your personal skill trees to level up.

step3.title: Step 3: Create Habits & Quests
step3.description: Add tasks and habits to each Domain. Assign XP, difficulty, and schedule your grind.

step4.title: Step 4: Track & Earn Rewards
step4.description: Complete quests, earn XP, collect crystals, and unlock levels & achievements in your dashboard.

step5.title: Step 5: Daily Reflection
step5.description: Use Daily Comment to reflect, log your emotions, and track your personal journey.

step6.title: Step 6: Adapt & Celebrate
step6.description: Revise your Matrix as you evolve. Celebrate victories with community badges and flex your progress.

gettingStarted.title: To get started with the app, follow these steps:

step1.title: Step 1:
step1.description: Create your Identity Matrix, which will outline your development goals and areas of focus.

step2.title: Step 2:
step2.description: Create a domain for your selected matrix to organize your habits by different themes or categories.

step3.title: Step 3:
step3.description: Within each domain, create habits that will help you build the necessary skills and achieve your goals.

identityMatrix.title: Enter the name of your identity matrix
identityMatrix.description: Short description of your identity matrix.
identityMatrix.label: Manage Identity Matrices
identityMatrix.notFoundDescription: You haven't created any identity matrices yet. Start by creating one to visualize your goals and values.
identityMatrix.namePlaceholder: I identify myself as a businessman.
identityMatrix.descriptionPlaceholder: I want to become a successful entrepreneur and build my own business. I value creativity, innovation, and hard work. I am committed to continuous learning and personal growth. I want to inspire others to pursue their dreams and make a positive impact on the world.

domain.title: Domain:
domain.description: A domain is a life area you want to focus on, like a goal, value, or skill.
domain.label: Manage domains
domain.notFoundDescription: You haven't created any domains yet. Start by creating one to organize your habits and goals.

habit.title: Habit
habit.description: A habit is a behavior that you perform regularly, often without thinking about it. Habits can be positive or negative, and they can have a big impact on your life. By identifying your habits and working to change them, you can improve your health, happiness, and productivity.

dayPart.title: Part of the day
dayPart.placeholder: Select the part of the day

habit.label: Manage habits
habit.placeholder: Example: Read a book, exercise, meditate

dailyComment.title: Daily comment
dailyComment.description: A daily comment is a short reflection on your day. It can be a way to express gratitude, set intentions, or simply document your thoughts and feelings. By writing daily comments, you can gain insight into your emotions and experiences, and track your progress over time.
dailyComment.notFoundDescription: You haven't created any daily comments yet. Start by creating one to track your daily reflections and progress.

cookie.title: Accept the use of cookies
cookie.description: We use cookies to provide you with the best experience on our website. By clicking "Accept", you agree to the use of all cookies.
